summary: The diff adds a redeploy automation script and smoke-test documentation/templates, but it does not provide evidence that an actual redeploy was performed successfully or that smoke tests were executed and passed. There is also an added/modified project tracking file that was not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Trigger a fresh rebuild and redeploy of the existing app (frontend + backend) without introducing product changes, since the last deployment did not complete successfully.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff adds a script to perform a redeploy, but does not contain evidence (e.g., deployment logs, updated canister IDs/URLs, CI output, or configuration changes) that a new deployment was actually executed and completed without errors as required by the acceptance criteria.

missing_requirements.requirement: After redeploy, run the documented smoke tests to confirm the deployment is healthy (landing page, hash-based routing, Internet Identity login, and core authenticated routes).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff adds a checklist and report template, but contains no evidence that smoke tests were actually run or that results meet the acceptance criteria (pass/fail outcomes, filled report, or captured results).

hallucinated_features.description: Added internal project/state tracking file with feature request entries and metadata.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asks for a redeploy retry and post-redeploy smoke testing; it does not request adding project management/state metadata files.
